title: Cap Stand, mid-18th century
medium: Earthenware; faience, underglaze decoration, overglaze decoration
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: On pierced glob continuous landscape that includes moving figures and a tree, in blue and mauve (manganese). Brown overglaze partially scraped off. Tri-foil scroll design on pedestal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Stand, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Earthenware; faience, underglaze decoration, overglaze decoration. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-60-8.
